MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Cranshaws and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.36am. Our emergency response team have now arrived on site in the local area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because our engineers are carrying out network investigations to locate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.54am on Thursday 1st April 2021.
